A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to love this movie but can't. \nThe choices they made for beloved characters were just terrible\, and Johnson seems to have just tossed out all the plot arcs set up by episode 7.  This movie was a heartbreak of missed potential.  I don't even know what they do from here with where they left the story. Just a disappointment and betrayal of the fans.
